title: Medieval Vel'Koz skin concept
body: Two versions. The second one has the same abillities, but when casting one the helmet opens. There could also be a fire arrows flying on the ult.

replies.body: Honestly that second one is hilarious.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot jinxylord,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fXdFhVZj,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2017-06-06T23:28:37.466+0000)
>
> Honestly that second one is hilarious.

VEL'KOZ WAS A MAN. I mean, he was a DRAGON MAN. Or, maybe he was just DRAGON... but he was still VEL'KOZ! VEELLL'K0O0ZZZZZZZ!!!

Researching the jungle creeps; researching the minions; researching all the champ'ions, on the summonEERR's RIIIIFT!
Does this mean Vel'Koz will get a skin? I hope so.
Now you've committed yourself to make that skin a reality :3
Wow nice job. That looks cool. I hope Vel'Koz's next skin will be an ultimate skin. Is number 2 supposed to be the recall animation?

> [{quoted}](name=Vanic998,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fXdFhVZj,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-06-06T16:16:47.831+0000)
>
> Wow nice job. That looks cool. I hope Vel'Koz's next skin will be an ultimate skin. Is number 2 supposed to be the recall animation?

Thanks. Nope, thats just another version of my idea :)
It could be the recall. Have it drop onto Vel'Koz's head while he's recalling, then have it heat up and melt off as Vel shoots out flames.
Sounds cool. I hope Vel'Koz gets a new skin. Preferably an ultimate skin.
I'd pay good money for an Illaoi themed Nagakaborous skin (did I spell it right?) New voice lines, model (that changes somehow), and green particles.
Next Vel skin: Mike Wazowski

> [{quoted}](name=Swagtastical,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=fXdFhVZj,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2017-06-06T23:34:23.512+0000)
>
> Next Vel skin: Mike Wazowski

Kowski-Kowski.

Thats cool. 
I honestly don't get why we don't have a bad ass octopus Vel Koz skin... 8 tentacles instead of 3 and ink particles with his body changing color a depending either on terrain (nothing that would give this skin a pay to win advantage) or on what spell is casted.

Vel koz is the king of adaptation and the octopus is pretty badass when it comes to adapting to survive.
You know the first one kinda a rip off from How to Train a Dragon 2
The cartoony style of the picture fits perfectly with the skin xD
I see a dragon thing, I upvote. Well done.

Could make him an Ahriman from Final Fantasy

https://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/finalfantasy/images/c/c4/Ahriman_PSP.png/revision/latest?cb=20121014144026

copyrite unfortunately

otherwise Beholder Velkoz could be a thing

How about Kraken Velkoz ? or Invader Velkoz ?

though I like the dragon concept

though if you want totally kookie:  Disco Velkoz  XD
He already has definitley not vel so i'm not sure if he can get another silly skin but i love the idea.
reminds me of the inferno dragon from clash

I like it. Alot. Well done. +1

Eye looks a bit like Sauron though.
